text: aur allaah vahee hai, jisane tumhaare lie aakaashon tatha dharatee kee utpatti kee aur aakaash se jal barasaaya, phir usase tumhaaree jeevika ke lie anek prakaar ke phal nikaale aur nauka ko tumhaare vash mein kiya, taaki saagar mein usake aadesh se chale aur nadiyon ko tumhaare lie vashavartee kiya
